name: Apples contain a lot of iron [demo]
name_original: Apples contain a lot of iron [demo]
description:
This is a prototype of Sokoban-like game about a very long snake who accidentally ate a magnet and now is able to push apples at a distance. There are 21 levels out of 64 in this demo version.

Controls:

Arrow keysMoveXSelectZUndoRRestartEscLevel select
